attributes.action: trigger article 50 under royal prerogative for a hard Brexit immediately!
attributes.additional_details: mp's had their vote when they voted for the referendum by a majority 6-1! so there for they gave their permission knowing that the warning was given that we would leave should that be the will of the people! so now we the people have spoken and we want brexit and no freedom of movement! non negotiable! so mp's should do what we pay them to do and accept the democratic will of the people!
attributes.background: we were entered into the EU under royal prerogative so we should leave the EU under royal prerogative! we must have restriction of free movement and feel our mp's will go against our wishes!
